attributes.action: Remove MPs who no longer represent their constituents or their manifestos
attributes.background:
Remove MPs who are now going against their constituents and manifestos they were elected on. 
Also seek to bring charges against any mp who as deliberately worked with the EU to delay or stop brexit against the democratic vote of the United kingdom.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office due to their views or opinions. 

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/270324
